006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelDefinition;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.INamedModelInstanceAbsolute;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.INamedModelInstanceGrouped;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ModelWalker;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
020import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NotOwning;
021
022import java.io.PrintWriter;
023import java.util.Collection;
024import java.util.EnumMap;
025import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
030import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
031
032/**
033 * Generates a mermaid diagram from a Metaschema {@link IModule}.
034 */
035@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap" })
036public final class MermaidErDiagramGenerator {
037  @NonNull
038  private static final Lazy<Map<IDiagramNode.Relationship, Pair<String, String>>> RELATIONSHIP_SYMBOLS
039      = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> {
040        Map<IDiagramNode.Relationship, Pair<String, String>> retval = new EnumMap<>(IDiagramNode.Relationship.class);
041
042        retval.put(IDiagramNode.Relationship.ZERO_OR_ONE, Pair.of("|o", "o|"));
043        retval.put(IDiagramNode.Relationship.ONE, Pair.of("||", "||"));
044        retval.put(IDiagramNode.Relationship.ZERO_OR_MORE, Pair.of("}o", "o{"));
045        retval.put(IDiagramNode.Relationship.ONE_OR_MORE, Pair.of("}|", "|{"));
046
047        return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(retval);
048      }));
049
050  private static String generateRelationsip(@NonNull IDiagramNode.Relationship relationship) {
051    Pair<String, String> symbols = RELATIONSHIP_SYMBOLS.get().get(relationship);
052    return symbols.getLeft() + "--" + symbols.getRight();
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Generate a Mermaid diagram for the provided module, using the provided
057   * writer.
058   *
059   * @param module
060   *          the Metaschema module to create a diagram for
061   * @param writer
062   *          the writer to use to generate the diagram code
063   */
064  public static void generate(@NonNull IModule module, @NonNull PrintWriter writer) {
065    DiagramNodeModelVisitor visitor = new DiagramNodeModelVisitor();
066
067    writer.println("erDiagram");
068
069    for (IAssemblyDefinition root : module.getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions()) {
070      assert root != null;
071      visitor.walk(root);
072    }
073
074    MermaidNodeVistor mermaidVisitor = new MermaidNodeVistor(visitor, writer);
075    for (IDiagramNode node : visitor.getNodes()) {
076      writer.format("  %s[\"%s\"] {%n", node.getIdentifier(), node.getLabel());
077
078      for (IDiagramNode.IAttribute attribute : node.getAttributes()) {
079        writer.format("    %s %s%n",
080            attribute.getDataType().getPreferredName().getLocalName(),
081            attribute.getLabel());
082      }
083      writer.format("  }%n");
084      for (IDiagramNode.IEdge edge : node.getEdges()) {
085        writer.flush();
086        edge.accept(mermaidVisitor);
087      }
088    }
089
090    // writer.print(visitor.getDiagram());
091  }
092
093  private static final class MermaidNodeVistor implements IDiagramNodeVisitor {
094    @NonNull
095    private final DiagramNodeModelVisitor nodeVisitor;
096    @SuppressWarnings("resource")
097    @NonNull
098    private final PrintWriter writer;
099
100    private MermaidNodeVistor(
101        @NonNull DiagramNodeModelVisitor nodeVisitor,
102        @NotOwning @NonNull PrintWriter writer) {
103      this.nodeVisitor = nodeVisitor;
104      this.writer = writer;
105    }
106
107    @NonNull
108    public DiagramNodeModelVisitor getNodeVisitor() {
109      return nodeVisitor;
110    }
111
112    @NonNull
113    @NotOwning
114    public PrintWriter getWriter() {
115      return writer;
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public void visit(DefaultDiagramNode.ModelEdge edge) {
120      INamedModelInstanceAbsolute instance = edge.getInstance();
121      IModelDefinition definition = instance.getDefinition();
122      writeRelationship(
123          edge.getNode(),
124          ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getNodeVisitor().lookup(definition)),
125          edge.getRelationship(),
126          instance.getEffectiveName());
127    }
128
129    @Override
130    public void visit(DefaultDiagramNode.ChoiceEdge edge) {
131      INamedModelInstanceAbsolute instance = edge.getInstance();
132      IModelDefinition definition = instance.getDefinition();
133      writeRelationship(
134          edge.getNode(),
135          ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getNodeVisitor().lookup(definition)),
136          edge.getRelationship(),
137          "Choice: " + instance.getEffectiveName());
138    }
139
140    @Override
141    public void visit(DefaultDiagramNode.ChoiceGroupEdge edge) {
142      INamedModelInstanceGrouped instance = edge.getInstance();
143      IModelDefinition definition = instance.getDefinition();
144      writeRelationship(
145          edge.getNode(),
146          ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getNodeVisitor().lookup(definition)),
147          edge.getRelationship(),
148          "ChoiceGroup: " + edge.getInstance().getEffectiveDisciminatorValue() + ": " + instance.getEffectiveName());
149    }
150
151    private void writeRelationship(
152        @NonNull IDiagramNode left,
153        @NonNull IDiagramNode right,
154        @NonNull IDiagramNode.Relationship relationship,
155        @NonNull String label) {
156      getWriter().format("  %s %s %s : \"%s\"%n",
157          left.getIdentifier(),
158          generateRelationsip(relationship),
159          right.getIdentifier(),
160          label);
161    }
162  }
163
164  private static final class DiagramNodeModelVisitor
165      extends ModelWalker<Void> {
166    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
167    @NonNull
168    private final Map<IModelDefinition, IDiagramNode> nodeMap = new LinkedHashMap<>();
169
170    public Collection<IDiagramNode> getNodes() {
171      return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableCollection(ObjectUtils.notNull(nodeMap.values()));
172    }
173
174    @Nullable
175    public IDiagramNode lookup(@NonNull IModelDefinition definition) {
176      return nodeMap.get(definition);
177    }
178
179    @Override
180    protected Void getDefaultData() {
181      return null;
182    }
183
184    @Override
185    protected void visit(IFlagDefinition def, Void data) {
186      // do nothing
187    }
188
189    @Override
190    protected boolean visit(IFieldDefinition def, Void data) {
191      return !def.getFlagInstances().isEmpty() && handleDefinition(def);
192    }
193
194    @Override
195    protected boolean visit(IAssemblyDefinition def, Void data) {
196      return handleDefinition(def);
197    }
198
199    private boolean handleDefinition(@NonNull IModelDefinition definition) {
200      boolean exists = nodeMap.containsKey(definition);
201      if (!exists) {
202        nodeMap.put(definition, new DefaultDiagramNode(definition));
203      }
204      return !exists;
205    }
206  }
207
208  private MermaidErDiagramGenerator() {
209    // disable construction
210  }
211}
